name: 5 seconds (Eric_Fulla)
description:
Time flies, but so do you.

Route your way through the levels killing everyone in record time. Remember, every time you kill an enemy the timer resets. So be smart, waste no time and use your decoy teleport skill to the most optimal effect.

I hope you like my game :D

--Credit to the sound designers from freesound--

beerbelly38, JohnLoser, newagesoup and kwahmah_02

music by Timbre

DEV notes - I made this game by myself so I had to cut a LOT of corners, mainly art and UI design. Overall though, I'm pretty proud of the end result (especially game design wise). Ultimately, this game is the exploration of 2 very simple (but deep) mechanics and on that note the game delivers exactly what I wanted.
